title: Like A Monster
notes: In the instrumental section the chords map to the hits. It'll make sense if you listen and look at the chords. Also, the chorus is stripped down a bit- watch for it.

sections.prechorus: f#m f#m f#m A g#m f#m f#m g#m f#m
sections.instrumental: f#m f#m f#m A g#m f#m f#m g#m f#m E A E A
